languages.text: "Лишь отблагодарила твоих подданных, Домин'{name}. Это самое малое, что я могла им дать в ответ на это". {n}Кибелла указывает на украшенную веранду и яства.{/n} "Или ты лично позаботил{mf|ся|ась} обо всем этом?"

traits.locale_text: "Я лишь отблагодарила твоих подданных, Эним'{name}. Это самое малое, что я могла бы им дать в ответ на это". {n}Кибелла делает жест рукой с бокалом, указывая на украшенную веранду и многочисленные яства.{/n} "Или ты утверждаешь, что лично позаботил{mf|ся|ась} обо всем этом?"

languages.text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"
languages.original_text: "Лишь отблагодарила твоих подданных, Домин'{name}. Это самое малое, что я могла им дать в ответ на это". {n}Кибелла указывает на украшенную веранду и яства.{/n} "Или ты лично позаботил{mf|ся|ась} обо всем этом?"

traits.locale_text: "I merely offered my gratitude to your subjects, Enim'{name}. I had to at least express my appreciation for all this." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or do I have you to thank for doing all this work with your own hands?"

"I merely offered my gratitude to your subjects, Enim'{name}. I had to at least express my appreciation for all this." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or do I have you to thank for doing all this work with your own hands?"

"I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Enim'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

"I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Enim'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

"I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

"I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

languages.text: "Ich wollte lediglich Euren Untertanen meinen Dank ausdrücken, Domin'{name}. Ich musste wenigsten meiner Wertschätzung für all das Ausdruck verleihen." {n}Sie deutet auf die Dekorationen und das Essen.{/n} "Oder sollte ich Euch danken, dass Ihr all das mit Euren eigenen Händen vorbereitet habt?"
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte lediglich Euren Untertanen meinen Dank ausdrücken, Domin'{name}. Ich musste wenigsten meiner Wertschätzung für all das Ausdruck verleihen." {n}Sie deutet auf die Dekorationen und das Essen.{/n} "Oder sollte ich Euch danken, dass Ihr all das mit Euren eigenen Händen vorbereitet habt?"

languages.text: «Solo pretendía mostrar mi gratitud a sus súbditos, Domin'{name}. Tenía que expresar mi aprecio por todo esto, al menos». {n}Señala a las decoraciones y la comida.{/n} «¿O debería darle las gracias a usted por preparar todo esto con sus propias manos?».
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo pretendía mostrar mi gratitud a sus súbditos, Domin'{name}. Tenía que expresar mi aprecio por todo esto, al menos». {n}Señala a las decoraciones y la comida.{/n} «¿O debería darle las gracias a usted por preparar todo esto con sus propias manos?».

languages.text: 「私はただ、あなたの臣民たちに感謝の意を表したかっただけよ、ドミン・{name}。少なくとも、これだけのことをしてくれたのだから、お礼の気持ちを伝えなければならなかったの」{n}彼女は装飾や食事を手で指し示す。{/n}「それとも、これを全部あなた自身の手でやってくれてありがとうって言った方がよかった？」
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

traits.locale_text: 「私はただ、あなたの臣民たちに感謝の意を表したかっただけよ、エニム・{name}。少なくとも、これだけのことをしてくれたのだから、お礼の気持ちを伝えなければならなかったの」{n}彼女は装飾や食事を手で指し示す。{/n}「それとも、これを全部あなた自身の手でやってくれてありがとうって言った方がよかった？」

languages.text: “我只是想对你的臣民表达感谢之情，秘者{name}。至少，我得为当下的一切表示感谢。”{n}她指着华美的装饰和食物。{/n}“或者说，我应该感谢你？感谢你一个人亲力亲为，准备好了这一切？”
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

traits.locale_text: “我只是想对你的臣民表达感谢之情，秘者{name}。至少，我得为当下的一切表示感谢。”{n}她指着华美的装饰和食物。{/n}“或者说，我应该感谢你？感谢你一个人亲力亲为，准备好了这一切？”

languages.text: « Je voulais seulement faire preuve de gratitude envers vos sujets, Domin'{name}. Je me devais d'exprimer à quel point j'ai apprécié tout ceci, {n}dit-elle en désignant les décorations et la nourriture.{/n} « Ou est-ce vous qui avez préparé tout cela de vos propres mains ? Auquel cas, c'est vous que je devrais remercier. »
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais seulement faire preuve de gratitude envers vos sujets, Domin'{name}. Je me devais d'exprimer à quel point j'ai apprécié tout ceci, {n}dit-elle en désignant les décorations et la nourriture.{/n} « Ou est-ce vous qui avez préparé tout cela de vos propres mains ? Auquel cas, c'est vous que je devrais remercier. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca tebaana şükranımı sunmak istedim Domin'{name}. Tüm bunlar için hiç değilse minnettarlığımı dile getirmem gerekiyordu." {n}Eliyle dekorasyonları ve yiyecekleri işaret ediyor.{/n} "Yoksa tüm bunları kendi ellerinle yaptığın için sana mı teşekkür etmeliyim?"
languages.original_text: "I merely wanted to offer my gratitude to your subjects, Domin'{name}. I had to express my appreciation for all this, at least." {n}She gestures at the decorations and the food.{/n} "Or should I be thanking you for doing all this with your own bare hands?"
